lead_paragraph: The violence of the past week cried out more for a unifying candidate and revealed how hard it is for Mr. Trump and Mrs. Clinton to become that person.

headline.print_headline: Heal Discord? 2016 Candidates Are Seen as a Main Source of It
headline.main: Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton Struggle to Be Unifying Voice for Nation

snippet: The violence of the past week cried out more for a unifying candidate and revealed how hard it is for Mr. Trump and Mrs. Clinton to become that person....
abstract: Presumptive presidential candidates Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump both continue to fail in their efforts to present reassuring and healing voice that can unify nation in times of crisis; inability of either candidate to unite nation in crisis is particularly apparent in aftermath of police shootings of two black men and sniper ambush that killed five police officers in Dallas.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dallas, Tex, Shooting of Police Officers (2016)
